name: Assassin Commando Shooter 3D
description:
Get ready for getting into 3d action game to explore your super commando skills. Assassin Commando has beautiful 3D effect visuals that will make your gaming experience much better than other war like mission games. you can choose your weapon according to your commando mission requirement.
Follow orders from command and get to the best vantage point to take out all enemy targets. Before the eradication of all the enemies, be careful of the action, pay attention to the surrounding environment, to ensure their own safety.This game gives you an amazing control interface, high quality visual effects, precise control, advanced physical and disruptive effects. Slide your screen, join the fierce battle in it.
